lines: SDAH:457
1. Mafungo a tadulu, a a ntakadzesa;
Na lufuno lwa hone, lune lwa ntakadzesa,
Luno lu na tshilidzi, luno lu na ngoho,
Ndi a fushea nne, u fhirisa zwothe.
Mafhungo a tadulu, zwo naka u a pfa-vho,
Nga Yesu Mukololo, Ene ndi Mutshidzi.
2. Mafhungo a tadulu, ndi a mangadzaho;
Lufuno lwa hone, lu fhirisa na dzindoro,
Zwo naka u tevhela, we a tshidza nne,
Ndi zwine nda di renda, nd i renda kufuno.
3. Thi fhidzi u imba, mafhungo a difhaho,
Naho a dovhololwa, a kha di do takadza,
Zwo naka ri sa shayi, mafhungo madifha,
Mafhungo a u tshidza, Manwalo Makhethwa.
4. Mafhungo a difhaho, a a ntakadza,
Ndi pfa ndala khulu, ya mafhungo awe Yesu,
Na ngei makoleni, ndi do imba hone,
Mafhungo a lufuno, mafhungo a kale.
